required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Comparison of Ultrasound-guided Location of Laryngeal Mask With Air Leakage Test
clinical_study.official_title: Comparison of Ultrasound-guided Location of Laryngeal Mask With Air Leakage Test: A Randomized Controlled Trial

brief_summary.textblock: Compare the accuracy of two methods of ultrasound and air leakage test in positioning laryngeal mask. Validate the relationship between ultrasound scores, air leak levels, and bronchoscopic classification in positioning laryngeal mask

primary_outcome.description: Anesthesiologist who are familiar with ultrasound would scan three planes of neck
Anesthesiologist would auscultate the degree of leakage

primary_outcome.time_frame: procedure (after ultrasound examination or leakage test)
primary_outcome.description: Anesthesiologist would confirm the position of LMA by fiberscope

secondary_outcome.measure: Complications related to LMA (laryngeal mask airway )
secondary_outcome.description: such as reflection of tussis, sore throat, hoarseness, bleeding and so on

intervention.description: Anesthesiologist would scan three planes of the neck to position the LMA
Anesthesiologist would use air leakage test to position the LMA

results_reference.citation: Song K, Yi J, Liu W, Huang S, Huang Y. Confirmation of laryngeal mask airway placement by ultrasound examination: a pilot study. J Clin Anesth. 2016 Nov;34:638-46. doi: 10.1016/j.jclinane.2016.06.019. Epub 2016 Aug 3.

Pérez-Herrero MA, de la Varga O, Flores M, Sánchez-Ruano J, Otero M, Buisán F. Descriptive study of ultrasound images of the upper airway obtained after insertion of laryngeal mask. Rev Esp Anestesiol Reanim. 2018 Oct;65(8):434-440. doi: 10.1016/j.redar.2018.05.004. Epub 2018 Jun 30. English, Spanish.
Osman A, Sum KM. Role of upper airway ultrasound in airway management. J Intensive Care. 2016 Aug 15;4:52. doi: 10.1186/s40560-016-0174-z. eCollection 2016. Review.

Zhou ZF, Xia CZ, Wu M, Yu LN, Yan GZ, Ren QS, Hu CX, Yan M. Comparison of three methods for the confirmation of laryngeal mask airway placement in female patients undergoing gynecologic surgery. Ultrasound Med Biol. 2015 May;41(5):1212-20. doi: 10.1016/j.ultrasmedbio.2014.12.002. Epub 2015 Mar 5.

Kim J, Kim JY, Kim WO, Kil HK. An ultrasound evaluation of laryngeal mask airway position in pediatric patients: an observational study. Anesth Analg. 2015 Feb;120(2):427-32. doi: 10.1213/ANE.0000000000000551.

Ghai B, Ram J, Makkar JK, Wig J. Fiber-optic assessment of LMA position in children: a randomized crossover comparison of two techniques. Paediatr Anaesth. 2011 Nov;21(11):1142-7. doi: 10.1111/j.1460-9592.2011.03632.x. Epub 2011 Jun 21.
